projectInfo.vision: To provide a robust, self-sufficient, and easily maintainable Bitcoin and Lightning node environment with comprehensive monitoring and alerting capabilities.
projectInfo.goal: To simplify the setup, operation, and maintenance of a full Bitcoin node, Electrum Rust Server (electrs), and Mempool.space instance, ensuring high availability and proactive issue detection.

milestones: Bitcoin Knots node installed and configured.
Initial blockchain synchronization completed.
bitcoind service running reliably.
electrs installed and configured.
electrs service integrated with bitcoind.
Initial electrs indexing completed.
deliverables: Working electrs service providing Electrum client access.

milestones: Mempool.space backend installed and configured.
Mempool.space backend connected to bitcoind and MariaDB.
Mempool.space frontend built and deployed.
Nginx configured for Mempool.space frontend and backend API proxy.
deliverables: Fully functional Mempool.space instance accessible via web browser.
Real-time transaction and blockchain data display.

milestones: Comprehensive system health scripts developed.
Email notification system configured.
alert_manager.sh script implemented for critical alerts and daily reports.
Log rotation configured for project logs.
deliverables: Automated daily system health reports via email (HTML format).
Automated critical alerts for service failures or threshold breaches.

milestones: Review and apply security best practices (e.g., firewall rules, user permissions).
Performance tuning for services (bitcoind, electrs, MariaDB).
Disk space management and pruning strategies.
Implement regular backup procedures for critical data.
Explore containerization (Docker) for improved isolation and deployment.
deliverables: More secure and efficient node operation.

milestones: Lightning Network Daemon (LND) installation and configuration.
Web interface for node management and monitoring.
Integration with other Bitcoin/Lightning applications.
Automated updates and patching strategy.

risks.mitigation: Implement regular, automated backups of critical data to a separate location.
Follow a regular patching and update schedule for all system components.
Use reliable hardware, verify backup integrity, and monitor system logs.
Utilize the monitoring and alerting system for rapid failure notification and response.
Implement blockchain pruning, log rotation, and disk usage monitoring.
